get.description:
Description

Returns next bus arrival times at a stop.

Response Elements




Element

Description





Predictions


Array containing bus predictions (NextBusPrediction).




StopName

Full name of the given StopID.





NextBusPrediction Elements





DirectionNum

Denotes a binary direction (0 or 1) of the bus. There is no
specific mapping to direction, but a different value for the same
route signifies that the buses are traveling in opposite
direc
